attributes.action: Stud dog owners need a lisence to breed
attributes.additional_details: I contacted the local authority and they advised there are no laws requiring a stud down owner to have a lisence to breed so they were unable to do anything. If he was breeding female dogs they would have the authority to look into the matter.
attributes.background: I took my dog to an experienced stud dog owner, he advised he was going to put a muzzle on her as a precaution and fitted the muzzle too tight. I stressed to him that it was too tight and he ignored my concerns. This resulted in him suffocating my dog to death.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the licensing of dog breeders, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
